[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Offer” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/kmn4veeepr8-scaled.jpg” custom_padding=”184px||45px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” locked=”off” filter_brightness=”84%” filter_contrast=”124%” background_position=”center_right”][et_pb_row custom_margin=”|||” _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-90px|||||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

HAWAII
6 DAYS/5 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”39px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|0px|33px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ locked=”off” custom_margin=”-29px|auto||auto||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”37px” custom_margin=”||24px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01 : HONOLULU

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald” custom_margin=”-11px|||||”]

Arrive at Honolulu International Airport. You will be transferred to the hotel.

Overnight in Honolulu.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_image align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ custom_padding=”0px|||||”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”32px” custom_margin=”-27px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 02: PEARL HARBOR, USS ARIZONA, HONOLULU

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-19px||9px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

Breakfast at the hotel.

Wait in the lobby for pickup for your Pearl Harbor tour.

The legacy of Pearl Harbor lives on, with Hawaii playing a critical role during the turn of events that reshaped world history. On this popular narrated tour of Pearl Harbor, the USS Arizona Memorial and other historic Honolulu landmarks, you will explore firsthand what happened on Dec. 7, 1941 and how it greatly impacted the outcome of World War II. The excursion begins at Pearl Harbor to relive the events that unfolded on that fateful Sunday morning in 1941, when U.S. forces at Pearl Harbor came under attack by Japan, catapulting the United States into World War II.

A visit by boat to the USS Arizona Memorial then offers a real-time setting for reflecting on the extensive battle that took place, leading to the loss of life of 1,177 of the ship’s crewmen.

The journey then moves onward to the National Memorial Cemetery of the Pacific, where many of those who fought for their country are buried, and finally past Honolulu’s most noteworthy historical landmarks, including Iolani Palace, Kawaiahao Church, the Hawaii State Capitol and Honolulu City Hall.

Overnight in Honolulu.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”10px|auto||auto||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_image align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”37px” custom_margin=”-31px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: DAY AT LEISURE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”279px” custom_margin=”-17px|||||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

After breakfast spend you day exploring Waikiki on your own or you can add an optional tour, Atlantis Submarine tour or Polynesian Cultural Center.

Atlantis Submarine tour:  Experience a unique oceanic adventure in the world’s largest recreational submarine. The dive site is located within view of iconic Leahi (Diamond Head) and is frequented by green sea turtles, sharks, yellow tangs, eels, and many other species of underwater marine life. See firsthand how sunken ships, remnants of hurricane-swept airliners, pyramid structures, and other objects have combined with Mother Nature to attract life to the Atlantis reef.

Polynesian Cultural Center:  Spend the day exploring the rich heritage of the Pacific Islands. Wander through 42 acres of tropical splendor and enjoy the adventure of traditional hands-on activities. Dine like royalty at an authentic Polynesian luau and top it off with the most spectacular evening show in the islands.

Overnight in Honolulu.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” custom_margin=”-17px|auto||auto||” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”59px” custom_margin=”||40px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 04: MAUI

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-50px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

Arrive at Maui. You will be transferred to the hotel.

Over Night in Maui.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|auto||200px||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” custom_margin=”16px|||||”]

DAY 05: HANA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-19px|||||” custom_padding=”0px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

Breakfast at the hotel

Wait in lobby for Hana Tour pickup. Discover Hana, the jewel of the Valley Isle, on this breathtaking adventure. Deeply steeped in Hawaiian ways, this cultural treasure in East Maui is accessible via a narrow, winding road marked by tiny bridges, wildly gorgeous foliage and waterfalls.

As you travel along on this 68-mile trip, your experienced driver & friendly guide will give a captivating narration of the island’s secrets all along the way. Weaving through the lush tropical rainforest, there are more than 600 curves & 59 one-lane bridges on the Road to Hana with stunning vistas, cascading waterfalls, and scenic coastal scenery galore! It’s more about the journey rather than the destination on the Road to Hana.

Overnight in Maui.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”17px|0px|0|0px|false|false” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” custom_padding=”||0px|||”]

DAY 06: DEPARTURE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald” custom_margin=”-20px|||||”]

Breakfast at the hotel.

Check out of the hotel and transfer to the airport for your flight to next destination/home.

HAVE A SAFE TRIP!

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ min_height=”873px” custom_margin=”-412px||142px|||” custom_padding=”0||50px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” global_module=”117″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_margin=”|auto||198px||”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.facebook.com/pages/Discover-Destinations/156630901051625″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%291%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″]
